technologies.name: TYPO3 CMS
technologies.description: TYPO3 is a free and open-source Web content management system written in PHP.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: TypeScript is an open-source language which builds on JavaScript  by adding static type definitions.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Firebase
technologies.description: Firebase is a Google-backed application development software that enables developers to develop iOS, Android and Web apps.

technologies.name: Angular
technologies.description: Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google.

technologies.name: Apache HTTP Server
technologies.description: Apache is a free and open-source cross-platform web server software.

technologies.name: Boomerang
technologies.description: boomerang is a JavaScript library that measures the page load time experienced by real users, commonly called RUM (Real User Measurement).

technologies.name: Akamai mPulse
technologies.description: Akamai mPulse is a real user monitoring (RUM) solution that enables companies to monitor, find, and fix website and application performance issues.

technologies.name: reCAPTCHA
technologies.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Akamai
technologies.description: Akamai is global content delivery network (CDN) services provider for media and software delivery, and cloud security solutions.
